choices: Product growth hack (evolve your existing product, not start from scratch)

choices: Not my jam, but I'd love to be an attendee.
questions.question: No promises, but would you be up for being a meeting host?
questions.description: (Your job would be to greet people and set a nice tone. We'd give you instructions, and PostHog would promote the event itself. You'd get some free merch.)

questions.question: Best way to reach you?
questions.description: Add your email if you're okay with us getting in touch about this. (No spam; just about this.)

appearance.thankYouMessageHeader: Alright, that's all we wanted to know!

questions.description:
Hi there 👋


I'm Seb, your account manager. Let me know if you get stuck setting anything up.

You can shoot me an email at seb@posthog.com or grab a meeting here.

^ that's me, Seb

questions.question: Would a private or team PostHog Query Workshop interest you?
questions.description:
We've found ~80% of failed queries in PostHog are resolved with another look at the data model and how to leverage it. As your assigned PostHog success human, I can get you there faster with easy to understand docs, how-tos, and best practices applied to what you're up to. My calendar is yours.
- David

appearance.thankYouMessageHeader: Looking forward to our workshop! - David
